headline: Why Invesco (IVZ) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of asset management firm Invesco (NYSE:IVZ) jumped 3.9% in the morning session after its mutual fund division announced it would resume taking new investments in three of its international funds. The fund house had previously suspended new subscriptions in these overseas fund-of-funds in October 2025, but decided to revoke the temporary suspension. Effective December 5, 2025, investors could once again make lump-sum purchases and start new systematic investment plans in the Invesco Global
